CustomField.formula:
IF( RecordType.Name = "Client Contact", CASE(seven20__Client_Contact_Status__c ,
"Active", IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0688d000007r5DT&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T8d00000MmZWh", "Active",25,151),
"DNU", IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0688d000007r5DU&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T8d00000MmZWm", "DNU",25,151), NULL ),
IF(RecordType.Name = "Candidate", CASE( seven20__Candidate_Status__c ,
"Unqualified", IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0688d000007r5DJ&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T8d00000MmZWS", "Unqualified", 25,151),
"Qualified", IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0688d000007r5DK&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T8d00000MmZSq", "Qualified", 25,151),
"Active", IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0688d000007r5DT&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T8d00000MmZWh","Active", 25,151),
"Interview", IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0688d000007r5DB&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T8d00000MmZW3", "Interview", 25,151),
"Placed", IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0688d000007r5DD&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T8d00000MmZWI", "Placed", 25,151),
"DNU", IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0688d000007r5DU&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T8d00000MmZWm", "DNU", 25,151), NULL ), NULL ) )
CustomField.label: Status Icon
